info.name: CRM - Properties DBV API Collection
info.description: All HubSpot objects store data in default and custom properties. These endpoints provide access to read and modify object properties in HubSpot.

request.description: Read a property group identified by {groupName}.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

request.description: Move a property group identified by {groupName} to the recycling bin.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

request.description: Perform a partial update of a property group identified by {groupName}. Provided fields will be overwritten.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

request.description: Read all existing property groups for the specified object type and HubSpot account.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

request.description: Create and return a copy of a new property group.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

request.description: Create a batch of properties using the same rules as when creating an individual property.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

request.description: Read a provided list of properties.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

request.description: Archive a provided list of properties. This method will return a 204 No Content response on success regardless of the initial state of the property (e.g. active, already archived, non-existent).
